snippet: The director said Thomas E. Duncan of Liberia was in critical condition as the police continued to scramble to contain the spread of the disease.

byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ and BRIAN KNOWLTON

lead_paragraph: The director said Thomas E. Duncan of Liberia was in critical condition as the police continued to scramble to contain the spread of the disease.

headline.main: Ebola Patient in Dallas ‘Fighting for His Life,’ C.D.C. Director Says
